--- title: Search API keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Python search API" description: "Python search API" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

We can connect to the CORD-19 Search app and use it to exemplify the search API

{% raw %} 
from vespa.application import Vespa

app = Vespa(url = "https://api.cord19.vespa.ai")
{% endraw %}

Specify the request body

Full flexibility by specifying the entire request body

{% raw %} 
body = {
  'yql': 'select title, abstract from sources * where userQuery();',
  'hits': 5,
  'query': 'coronavirus temperature sensitivity',
  'type': 'any',
  'ranking': 'bm25'
}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
results = app.search(body=body)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
results["root"]["fields"]

{'totalCount': 46917}
{% endraw %}

Query + term-matching + rank profile

{% raw %} 
from vespa.search import Search, OR, RankProfile

results = app.search(
    query="Is remdesivir an effective treatment for COVID-19?", 
    search_model = Search(
        match_phase=OR(), 
        rank_profile=RankProfile(name="bm25")
    )
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
results["root"]["fields"]

{'totalCount': 46917}
{% endraw %}

Query + term-matching + ann operator + rank_profile

{% raw %} 
from vespa.search import Search, ANN, WeakAnd, Union, RankProfile
from random import random

match_phase = Union(
    WeakAnd(hits = 10), 
    ANN(
        doc_vector="title_embedding", 
        query_vector="title_vector", 
        embedding_model=lambda x: [random() for x in range(768)],
        hits = 10,
        label="title"
    )
)
rank_profile = RankProfile(name="bm25", list_features=True)
search_model = Search(match_phase=match_phase, rank_profile=rank_profile)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
results = app.search(query="Is remdesivir an effective treatment for COVID-19?", 
          search_model=search_model)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
results["root"]["fields"]

{'totalCount': 1049}
{% endraw %}
